name: Quarry
summary: A multi-purpose board game GUI for Go, Amazons and Reversi
description: Quarry is a multi-purpose GUI for several board games, at present Go, Amazons and Reversi (a.k.a. Othello.) It allows users to play against computer players (third-party programs, e.g. GNU Go or GRhino) or other humans, view and edit game records.
